full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/13/2023 How To alance Your Checking Account FIRST, start with your Checkbook: 1. List your Checkbook Balance here $ 2. Subtract any service charges or other deductions not previously recorded $ 3. Add any credits not previously recorded, for example interest $ 4. This is your NEW CHECKBOOK BALANCE $ NOW, with your Checking Statement: 1. List your Statement Balance here $ 2. Add any current deposits not shown on this statement $ SUBTOTAL $ 3. List and total all outstanding checks, ATM withdrawals and automatic payments: ATM & Automatic Payments Check # Amount Check # Amount Date Amount TOTAL OF OUTSTANDING CHECKS $ 4.
